High School:

Graduate of Oakmont High School in Roseville, California

Capital Valley 1st Team All-Conference Player (2015,2016)

Sectional Championships(2014)

Junior National Volleyball Championships (2015, 2016, 2017)

Capital Valley Conference Scholar Athlete (2014, 2015, 2016)

Junior Academic Merit Award Summa Cum Laude (2016)

Senior Academic Merit Academic Award Magna Cum Laude (2017)

National Charity League of South Placer County (2013-2017)

Personal:

Full Name is Lauren Alyssa Davidian

Born March 16, 1999 in Miami, Florida

Daughter of Leslie and Mark Davidian

Lauren has two sisters Mikaela and Claire

Favorite Book: Outlander

Favorite Movie:Zombie Land

Favorite Musical Artist: Justin Timberlake

Favorite Athlete: Aaron Rogers

Club Team: Synergy Force, NCVC- 6 years

Hobbies Include: Reading, painting, hiking, traveling, watching movies, sand volleyball

Interesting Off the Court Info About Me: I am very excited to attend the same school as my older sister, who has been an incredible role model in my life. She will graduate with her ABA degree in December.

I Chose to Attend ERAU Because: " I love the campus, its small size, all the choices for engineering majors and being fairly close to home. ERAU also has a great volleyball team and I'm looking forward to playing with them."
